au.gov.ga.conn4d.impl.readers

Class Habitat_Shapefile

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.gov.ga.conn4d.impl.readers.Habitat_Shapefile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Habitat, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Habitat_Shapefile
extends java.lang.Object
implements Habitat, java.lang.Cloneable
    Reads and provides various search functions for an ESRI shape file.
    Author:
    Johnathan Kool

      • setLookupField

        public void setLookupField(java.lang.String field)
        Searches the feature set to see if the given coordinates lie within any of the polygons. If so, the polygon's unique identifier is returned. If not, NODATA is returned
        Specified by:
